#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        string s;
        cin>>s;

        if(s.length()==1)
        cout<<0<<endl;
        //no deletions for a char
        else if(s.length() > 1)
        {
            int count = 0;

            for(int i = 0; i< s.length()-1; i++)
            if(s[i] == s[i+1])
            count++;

            cout<<count<<endl;
        }
    }

}
